processingCommand.script:
REM force inheritance of Task variables
if EXIST ${FileWatcherFileName} GOTO FOUND
Echo ${FileWatcherFileName} not found, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:FOUND
IF "${OutgoingFileName}"=="" GOTO SKIP
:COPYFILE
Echo on
${XT_COPYFILE} from=${FileWatcherFileName} to=${OutgoingFileName} ${FileCopyOptions}
Echo off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo CopyFile ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:SKIP
Echo OutgoingFileName not defined, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
